message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.DB. 

The paper proposes a content-based news recommendation system that utilizes named entities and a knowledge graph to compute the shortest distance between entities across news articles. This involves natural language processing and machine learning techniques, which are commonly associated with the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper discusses the creation of a new human annotated dataset for evaluating content-based news recommendation systems, which falls under the Natural Language Processing (cs.CL) and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) sub-categories. Finally, the paper also mentions the use of a weighting scheme and graph traversal algorithm, which are related to the Database (cs.DB) sub-category.
